mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, franchisee_id, third_merchant_id, order_no, third_order_no, order_type, amount, process_state, remark, channel, rent_rebate, pay_time, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_profit_sharing_trade_order where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_profit_sharing_trade_order(tenant_id, franchisee_id, third_merchant_id, order_no, third_order_no, order_type, amount, process_state, remark, channel, rent_rebate, pay_time, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{tenantId}, #{franchiseeId}, #{thirdMerchantId}, #{orderNo}, #{thirdOrderNo}, #{orderType}, #{amount}, #{processState}, #{remark}, #{channel}, #{rentRebate}, #{payTime}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
